name: interfold
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to bend things so that a part of each one lies inside another one: interfolded paper hand towels
to combine things so that they become part of each other: The story interfolds folklore and history.
More examplesFewer examplesThe towels are interfolded so they are dispensed easily, presenting a new flap to the next user.The interfolded design helps to prevent the towels from ripping when they are pulled from the dispenser.Keep your kitchen well stocked with this interfolded wax paper.The two figures in the statue flow into one as their bodies interfold.The two kinds of textuality can be seen to inter-fold.
